amendment.description: An amendment numbered 163 printed in Part A of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funding for Executive Order 14019, relating to Promoting Access to Voting.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 201 - 187 (Roll no. 327).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tenney amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 201 - 187 (Roll no. 327).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
